sentences.sContent: Her cat came up and rubbed itself against their legs.
sentences.sCn: 她的猫上前来蹭了他们的腿。

sentences.sContent: The subject came up at work.
sentences.sCn: 这一话题在工作时被提及。

synos.tran: 走近；发生；开始；上升；发芽；被提出

trans.tranOther: If someone comes up or comes up to you, they approach you until they are standing close to you
